page.title: 20MEDIA Newspaper reports (2)
page.content: Reports from the{"Sussex Express" published every Friday. {June 21st 1985}- Land at Cider House Farm, Blackboys is to become a touring caravan site with 28 pitches. {June 21st 1985} A warm, sunny day attracted big crowds to the annual summer fete at Blackboys School on Saturday.Â£400 was raised for school equipment.{ { * * * * * * * { Credits :}This work was compiled by the children of Class 1W, Cross-in- Hand C.E.P. School.The children are aged from 9-11 years. Children not so far credited are :- Victoria Hutchin, David Farley, Ines Braidwood-Alves, Karl Thorpe, Richard King, Victoria Puttock, Simon Wilson, Emma Norrell-James, Alison Brown,Emma Badley, Lee Hughes. Teacher,Kathleen Ward.
